com.dmurph.mvc
Interface IRevertable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRevertableModel
public interface IRevertable

An object that is revertable, where changes can be "canceled".

Author:
Daniel Murphy

Method Summary
 boolean revertChanges()
          Reverts the model to the last time saveChanges() was called, or to it's original state if saveChanges() was never called.
 boolean saveChanges()
          Saves the current changes to the model so further calls to revertChanges() will revert changes to the model's current state.
 

Method Detail

saveChanges

boolean saveChanges()
Saves the current changes to the model so further calls to revertChanges() will revert changes to the model's current state.

Returns:
if there were changes to save

revertChanges

boolean revertChanges()
Reverts the model to the last time saveChanges() was called, or to it's original state if saveChanges() was never called.

Returns:
if changed were reverted
